contexts.context: Your fourfold <mark>duties</mark> are to: Faith, Family, Masters, and...

...responsibility for helping and protecting others. One's first <mark>duty</mark>, of course, is to one's fellow members...
...unbidden, from love of kin or faith to <mark>duty</mark>, it is not unholy. It is but...
...service in the Legion is the model for the <mark>duties</mark> of Imperial citizenship. Troopers are expected to demonstrate...
